alert.note: Alert for Northern Denali Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 22 at 5:39AM AKST until December 24 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 50 mph with gusts to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Northern Denali Borough. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult. Blowing snow will reduce visibility and cause snow drifts to form. Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds gusting to 40 mph will develop tonight and continue into Saturday. Winds are expected to increase dramatically Saturday night and could gust up to 80 mph from late Saturday night into Sunday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
